indicator: Occupational aspirations by young women and men
indicator_category: Expression of not having aspirations

indicator: Occupational aspirations by young women and men
indicator_category: aspirations in the domain of i) traditional agriculture and/or homemaker

indicator: Occupational aspirations by young women and men
indicator_category: aspirations for a paid job in the domain of ii) modern agriculture, or jobs as an agri-preneur or agricultural professional

indicator: Occupational aspirations by young women and men
indicator_category: aspirations for a paid job in the domain of iii) blue- or white-collar jobs

indicator: Occupational aspirations by young women and men
indicator_category: aspirations for a paid job iv) in an unspecified domain

indicator: Aspiration-attainment gap among young women and men
indicator_category: no discrepancy between the occupational aspiration and what is/can be achieved

indicator: Aspiration-attainment gap among young women and men
indicator_category: a discrepancy between the occupational aspiration and what is/can be achieved exists  (~wide gap: e.g. blue/white collar or modern/professional agriculture/preneur vs marriage or traditional agriculture)

indicator: Aspiration-attainment gap among young women and men
indicator_category: a discrepancy between the occupational aspiration and what is/can be achieved exists (~small gap:e.g. blue/white collar or modern/professional agriculture/preneur vs low paying job (factory, small shop, petty trade, homecraft (sewing, weaving, brewing...))
